fullText: Bryan Cranston gives a tour de force performance as Howard Beale in this electrifying adaptation of Paddy Chayefsky's prescient 1976 screenplay.
dtliExcerpt: Bryan Cranston gives a tour de force performance as Howard Beale in this electrifying adaptation of Paddy Chayefsky's prescient 1976 screenplay.
